lead_paragraph: Scott Hend came close to punching two drunk fans who heckled him as the Australian was plotting his way to the top of the BMW PGA Championship leaderboard, he said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Golf: Wentworth Leader Hend Wanted to Punch Drunk Hecklers
headline.main: Golf: Wentworth Leader Hend Wanted to Punch Drunk Hecklers

snippet: Scott Hend came close to punching two drunk fans who heckled him as the Australian was plotting his way to the top of the BMW PGA Championship leaderboard, he said on Saturday....
